REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2388 reute d f BC-KINGSBRIDGE,-MASCO-SE 06-01 0044

TEXT.TITLE: KINGSBRIDGE, MASCO SET MERGER
TEXT.BODY:
Kingsbridge Holdings Ltd, said it signed a letter of intent for a merger with <Masco Sports Inc>. The transaction calls for 230 mln sahres of Kingsbridge common stock to be issued to shareholders of Masco.
Reuter
